hero.Miro is your team's visual platform to c: Miro is your team's visual platform to connect, collaborate, and create ‚Äî together.
hero.Collaborate with your team within minute: Collaborate with your team within minutes

collaborate.title: Free forever
collaborate.about: Our free plan gives you unlimited team members, 3 boards, and 300+ expert-made templates. Signing up with your work email lets you bring in your team faster. See our pricing plans for more features.

collaborate.title: Easy integrations
collaborate.about: Miro has 100+ powerful integrations with tools you already use like G Suite, Slack, and Jira, so your workflow is seamless. View the full list in our Marketplace .

collaborate.title: Security first
collaborate.about: We treat your data like you would ‚Äî with the utmost care. We follow industry-leading security standards and give you tools to protect intellectual property. Learn more at our Trust Center .

1.title: Work together, wherever you work
1.text: In the office, remote, or a mix of the two, with Miro, your team can connect, collaborate, and co-create in one space no matter where you are.

2.title: Connect your tools, close your tabs
2.text: Whether you want to edit your Google Docs, resolve Jira issues, or collaborate over Zoom, Miro has 100+ integrations with tools you already use and love.

first comp.main: Built for the way you work
first comp.title: Brainstorming
first comp.text: Unleash creative ideas and build on them with the help of sticky notes, images, mind maps, videos, drawing capabilities ‚Äî the list goes on.

Cards.title: Loved by the world's best teams

card1.text: ‚ÄúWhen the pandemic hit, those of us who thrive on in-person collaboration were worried that our creativity and productivity would suffer. Miro was the perfect tool to help us with collaboration, whiteboarding, and retrospectives while remote.‚Äù

card2.text: ‚ÄúMiro helps solve one of the major gaps in product design: how to manage tasks across product designers whose projects are in different tools.‚Äù

card3.text: ‚ÄúAs we used Miro we moved from skepticism to belief to innovation, and now we have a tool that‚Äôs at the core of what we do and will continue to extend into the future.‚Äù
